segment.source: Settings and quick actions that can be locked down in Windows 10 Mobile (Windows 10)
segment.target: Settings and quick actions that can be locked down in Windows 10 Mobile (Windows 10)

segment.source: This topic lists the settings and quick actions that can be locked down in Windows 10 Mobile.
segment.target: This topic lists the settings and quick actions that can be locked down in Windows 10 Mobile.

segment.source: Settings and quick actions that can be locked down in Windows 10 Mobile
segment.target: Settings and quick actions that can be locked down in Windows 10 Mobile

segment.source: This topic lists the settings and quick actions that can be locked down in Windows 10 Mobile.
segment.target: This topic lists the settings and quick actions that can be locked down in Windows 10 Mobile.

segment.source: You can use Lockdown.xml to configure lockdown settings.
segment.target: You can use Lockdown.xml to configure lockdown settings.

segment.source: The following table lists the settings pages and page groups.
segment.target: The following table lists the settings pages and page groups.

segment.source: Use the page name in the Settings section of Lockdown.xml.
segment.target: Use the page name in the Settings section of Lockdown.xml.

segment.source: The Settings section contains an allow list of pages in the Settings app.
segment.target: The Settings section contains an allow list of pages in the Settings app.

segment.source: Quick action buttons are locked down in exactly the same way as Settings pages/groups.
segment.target: Quick action buttons are locked down in exactly the same way as Settings pages/groups.

segment.source: By default they are always conditional.
segment.target: By default they are always conditional.

segment.source: You can specify the quick actions as follows:
segment.target: You can specify the quick actions as follows:

segment.source: The following quick actions buttons are not conditional and will always be displayed:
segment.target: The following quick actions buttons are not conditional and will always be displayed:

segment.source: Some quick actions are dependent on related settings pages/page groups.
segment.target: Some quick actions are dependent on related settings pages/page groups.

segment.source: When a dependent page/group is not available, then the corresponding quick action will also be hidden.
segment.target: When a dependent page/group is not available, then the corresponding quick action will also be hidden.

segment.source: Dependent settings group/pages will be automatically enabled when a quick action is specified in the lockdown xml file.
segment.target: Dependent settings group/pages will be automatically enabled when a quick action is specified in the lockdown xml file.

segment.source: For example, if the Rotation quick setting is specified, the following group and page will automatically be added to the allow list: “SettingsPageSystemDisplay” and “SettingsPageDisplay”.
segment.target: For example, if the Rotation quick setting is specified, the following group and page will automatically be added to the allow list: “SettingsPageSystemDisplay” and “SettingsPageDisplay”.

segment.source: The following table lists the dependencies between quick actions and Settings groups/pages.
segment.target: The following table lists the dependencies between quick actions and Settings groups/pages.

segment.source: Configure Windows 10 Mobile using Lockdown XML
segment.target: Configure Windows 10 Mobile using Lockdown XML
